long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a widget to carsales.com that will filter results for the current search in order to only show 1 of each make/model of car.

very useful for sorting by power or something similar, so instead of sorting:

hatchbacks, power: highest>lowest

and getting 1982322 amg a45's in a row, you will simply get one amg a45, followed by the next most powerful hatchback and the next etc.
